title: Radisson Hotel Group appoints Nikhil Sharma as Managing Director and ASVP for South Asia
description: Sharma joins Radisson Hotel Group from Wyndham Hotels & Resorts (WHR) where he served as market managing director Eurasia, overseeing business development, operations, new openings, and sales and marketing. Before Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, he held the position of chief operating officer at Ginger Hotels. He was also a founding member of the Lemon Tree Hotel Company.
